title: Mathematical Inquiry Community Design to Enhance Social Presence in Virtual Human Development Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening social presence and mathematical problem-solving skills simultaneously through team collaboration activities in a smartphone-based VR simulation environment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three communication strategies to enhance social presence in VR-based collaborative environments
Learners complete mathematics problem-solving simulations with over 80% accuracy using the Gagn√© Nine Events instructional design model
Learners can produce a 3,000-character integrated report combining social, teaching, and cognitive interactions required by the Community of Inquiry (CoI) model

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
